problem_statement: The objective is to verify the state-machine integrity of a Dynamic Weighted Round Robin balancer. The task is 'hard' because the tester must validate that the interleaved selection sequence remains fair and predictable even when the underlying weights and GCD change mid-iteration. This requires careful tracking of expected vs. actual sequences across reconfiguration boundaries.
PASS_TO_PASS: Sequence continuity preserved across weight changes
Concurrency safety verified under massive parallelism
Adversarial inputs (zero, negative, large weights) handled safely
Boundary slice expansion and reduction tested
Sequence auditor validates long-run weighted fairness
